entities: United Nations Verification Mission in Colombia (UNVMC)
summary: The Security Council, reaffirming its commitment to Colombia's peace process, recalls its previous resolutions and statements. Welcoming progress towards peace, it urges parties to work together to address ongoing challenges through comprehensive implementation of the Final Agreement. Recalling resolutions 2366 (2017) and 2574 (2021), it notes the United Nations Verification Mission's role in verifying implementation and compliance. The Council decides to extend the Verification Mission's mandate until 31 October 2022 and expresses willingness to consider further extension based on agreement between the parties.
